Query: Online banking login use panni digital combank login pannalama?
Expected Answer: Yes.  If you have been migrated (transferred) to new ComBank Digital Platform you can use the same User ID and Password you have been using for Online Banking to access the new ComBank Digital platform.
Actual Answer: Yes.  If you have been migrated (transferred) to new ComBank Digital Platform you can use the same User ID and Password you have been using for Online Banking to access the new ComBank Digital platform.

Query: Naan new phone no i register panninan but OTP new phone no ikku varela enna seira?

Actual Answer: If you have provided written request to update your new mobile number in Online Banking platform please contact your Branch and request the number updated in ComBank Digital platform.

Query: App la bank statement epadi edukira?

Actual Answer: Please visit www.abc.lk or call 0771234567 for more details

Query: epdai contact details update panra?

Actual Answer: Please contact your branch for instructions on how to update your contact information and the documents you need to provide.

Query: Online transfer ikku bank slips epadi edukira?

Query: Eppidi online banking register pannurathu?
Expected Answer: 1. Simply click here to register online. 2.You can visit the nearest NTB branch and request for the facility.

Query: online banking register pana ena information thevi?

Actual Answer: 1. Registered Mobile Number and email address (with the bank) 2. Active Accounts or primary Credit Cards

Bill Payments 5.Balance inquiries 6.Statement Download 7.Get loan schedules 8.Online cheque book request and Stop cheque payments 9.Manage your own fund transfer limit online 10.Communication to Bank through secured email

Actual Answer: 1. Visit nearest BOC branch and fill out New Internet and Mobile banking application 2. Download this form and submit the duly filled application to the nearest BOC Branch

Query: Naan combank digital register panniten. eppadi login parathu?
Expected Answer: If you have already self registered to ComBank Digital please use the User ID  and the password you have created when registering to ComBank Digital.
Actual Answer: Yes you can by choosing Edit my Profile and then you can change the user ID to one you prefer provided its not used by some other user. You can do the same with your password.

Query: smart phone alathu tab ai BOC internet baning ai anukuvatku payanpaduthalama?

Actual Answer: Yes You can. Download the app from App store or just simply type online.BOC.lk on your mobile browser.

Query: enathu passsword ai marantaal ena seiya mudiyum?

Actual Answer: Please visit www.abc.lk or call 0771234567 for more details

Query: phone tholanthu vidalo alathu mobile number maatrap paadal ena seiya veendum?
Expected Answer: Inform immediately to our contact centre on 011 220 4444 to deactivate your User ID. If you change your mobile number please notify the bank in writing of the change and get details updated.
Actual Answer: Inform immediately to our contact centre on 011 220 4444 to deactivate your User ID. If you change your mobile number please notify the bank in writing of the change and get details updated.

Query: naan locked seiya padduruntaal ena seivathu?
Expected Answer: Attempting to login with incorrect password constantly to 3 times will lock the User ID. User Id can be unlocked by using Unlock My User ID link available on login screen.
Actual Answer: Please visit www.abc.lk or call 0771234567 for more details

Query: ethanai naadkaluku oru murai enathu password ai maatra veendum?
Expected Answer: Password will expire after 45 days so you have to change the password before the end of the 45 days period.
Actual Answer: Password will expire after 45 days so you have to change the password before the end of the 45 days period.

Query: enathu NRFC account il irunthu veroru LKR account ku panathinai transfer seiya mudiyuma? money transfer seiya mudiyumanal porunthak koodiya exchange rate enna?
Expected Answer: Yes you can. Prevailing NRFC transfer rate will be applied.
Actual Answer: Yes you can. Prevailing NRFC transfer rate will be applied.

Query: naan evvaru protect seiya paddukinreen?
Expected Answer: 1. Your User ID will be notified via email and password via SMS which you have provided to Bank of Ceylon at the time of registration. 2. Your User ID also can be changed. 3. One Time Password (OTP) will be sent to your mobile for critical transactions such as change password and adding a third party account. Without OTP nobody is able to do such transactions. 4.To reset your password you will have to remember the answers for the security questions.
Actual Answer: 1. Your User ID will be notified via email and password via SMS which you have provided to Bank of Ceylon at the time of registration. 2. Your User ID also can be changed. 3. One Time Password (OTP) will be sent to your mobile for critical transactions such as change password and adding a third party account. Without OTP nobody is able to do such transactions. 4.To reset your password you will have to remember the answers for the security questions.

Query: BOC credit card ai peruvatkana minimum requirement ena?
Expected Answer: Anyone who is above 18 years of age and having a net income Rs. 15000  minimum per month.
Actual Answer: Anyone who is above 18 years of age and having a net income Rs. 15000  minimum per month.

Query: credit card ai peruvatku PIN ean vaithiruka veendum?

Actual Answer: 1. For cash withdrawals through ATMs 2. When the credit card being used overseas some countries need the PIN to process credit card transactions.

Query: Wrong password aala account block aayitu eppidi account i retrieve pannurathu?

Actual Answer: Please visit www.abc.lk or call 0771234567 for more details

Query: PIN ai change seiyalama?
Expected Answer: You can change your PIN through any BOC ATM. We always advice you to do so.
Actual Answer: You can change your PIN through any BOC ATM. We always advice you to do so.

Query: credit card expired agum munnathakave nan puthiya credit card perukinrena?

Actual Answer: You will receive a new Credit Card before 30 days of the expiry date.

Actual Answer: 1. At any Point of Sale (POS) where merchant accepts Visa   MasterCard Amex 2.For online purchases 3. At ATMs for cash withdrawals (locally or internationally)

Query: enathu credit card ai other bank itku uriya POS machines ila use panalama?
Expected Answer: Yes

Query: CVV number enbathu ena? CVV number ai evvaru payanpaduthuvathu?

Actual Answer: 1. CVV is the 3 digit number printed on the reverse of your credit card. 2.CVV is useful for online purchases

Query: enathu credit card account balance ai evvaru check seivathu?

Actual Answer: Obtain internet banking (ebanking) facility from Bank of Ceylon and view the balance of the card account online. Request for same via any ATM or Call us on the number provided at the back side of your credit card.

Query: enathu credit limit ai evvaru increase or decrease seivathu?
Expected Answer: 1. To Increase  Submit the written request together with latest income statements to the Credit Card Issuing Department. 2. To Decrease  Submit the written request to the Credit Card Issuing Department.
Actual Answer: 1. To Increase  Submit the written request together with latest income statements to the Credit Card Issuing Department. 2. To Decrease  Submit the written request to the Credit Card Issuing Department.

Query: enathu BOC credit account ai close seivathu eppadi?
Expected Answer: Hand over a written request to one of our branches or posted to us after paying all dues with interest together with the card punched or broken to two parts.
Actual Answer: Hand over a written request to one of our branches or posted to us after paying all dues with interest together with the card punched or broken to two parts.

Query: enathu personal details ai change seivathu eppadi?
Expected Answer: Submit a duly signed letter with details of changes.
Actual Answer: Submit a duly signed letter with details of changes.

Query: enathu BOC credit card statements ai evvaru peruvathu?
Expected Answer: Monthly statement will be delivered via the post or email.
Actual Answer: Monthly statement will be delivered via the post or email.

Query: SMS alerts moolam etpadum advantages ena?
Expected Answer: You should immediately report this to the Card Centre or Call Centre 1975 or 0112204444. Make a record of your credit card numbers and telephone numbers for reporting lost or stolen cards. Keep that list in a safe place.
Actual Answer: You can provide us your mobile number to receive SMS alerts for every transaction which allows you to verify the genuineness of the transactions.

Query: credit card lost analo  thirudappadalo ena seivathu?
Expected Answer: You should immediately report this to the Card Centre or Call Centre 1975 or 0112204444. Make a record of your credit card numbers and telephone numbers for reporting lost or stolen cards. Keep that list in a safe place.
Actual Answer: You should immediately report this to the Card Centre or Call Centre 1975 or 0112204444. Make a record of your credit card numbers and telephone numbers for reporting lost or stolen cards. Keep that list in a safe place.

Query: enathu credit card ilaa fraudulent activity irupin ena seivathu?
Expected Answer: Call immediately our Call Centre number provided on the reverse of your credit card and inform us of the suspected transaction on your credit card.
Actual Answer: Call immediately our Call Centre number provided on the reverse of your credit card and inform us of the suspected transaction on your credit card.

Query: credit card accountku standing order ai set up seiya ena seiyavathu?
Expected Answer: You can visit any of our branches and open an account (if not an account holder of BOC). Thereafter you can submit a Standing Order request to set up a standing order facility for your account.
Actual Answer: You can visit any of our branches and open an account (if not an account holder of BOC). Thereafter you can submit a Standing Order request to set up a standing order facility for your account.

Query: money withdraw seiya enathu credit card ai anaithu ATM il use pana mudiyuma?
Expected Answer: Yes. You can use your BOC credit card at any ATM which accepts Visa and MasterCard to withdraw cash
Actual Answer: Yes. You can use your BOC credit card at any ATM which accepts Visa and MasterCard to withdraw cash

Query: If I suspect someone has stolen my password or used it to make a fraudulent purchase what should I do?
Expected Answer: You should immediately inform to our Call Centre via the number provided at the back side of your Credit Card and change the password.
Actual Answer: You should immediately inform to our Call Centre via the number provided at the back side of your Credit Card and change the password.

Actual Answer: Please visit www.abc.lk or call 0771234567 for more details

Query: enathu BOC credit card ai foreign countries il use pana mudiyuma?

Actual Answer: Yes. You can use your BOC credit card at any payment point which accepts Visa and MasterCard as payment networks.

Query: enthu credit card password ai veeru oruvar thirudi irunthalo allathu fraudulent purchase seiya use seithu irunthalo ena seiya mudiyum?
Expected Answer: You should immediately inform to our Call Centre via the number provided at the back side of your Credit Card and change the password.

Query: Account open pannum pothu FD certificate tharuvingala?
Expected Answer: Yes. you will be given a certificate with the following information. Deposit account number Date of deposit Date of maturity Value of deposit Names of the depositor s with their identity details Mode of interest payment Terms and conditions governing the deposit.
Actual Answer: Please visit www.abc.lk or call 0771234567 for more details

Query: FD certificate miss panna enna problems varum?

Request letter from the depositor s duly perfected Affidavit attested by a Notary  JP (A specimen of an affidavit could be obtained from the company)
Actual Answer: Please visit www.abc.lk or call 0771234567 for more details

Expected Answer: There will be no change to the terms since we are contracted to the rate until its maturity as per current rules.

Query: Currently entha periods la deposits accept panringa?
Expected Answer: 1. 12 Months 2. 18 Months 3. 24 Months 4. 36 Months 5. 48 6. 60 Months.
Actual Answer: 1. 12 Months 2. 18 Months 3. 24 Months 4. 36 Months 5. 48 6. 60 Months.

Expected Answer: The deposit can be made to your nearest HNB FINANCE Branch by means of Cash; fund transfer directly to a HNB FINANCE designated Bank account or Cheque  bank draft issued in favor of HNB FINANCE PLC
Actual Answer: Please visit www.abc.lk or call 0771234567 for more details

Query: Time to time deposit panna panna athu additional ah engada account la deposit ahuma?
Expected Answer: Additions part payments could be made only at the date of Maturity. Alternatively you could open a new deposit account.
Actual Answer: A computer generated renewal notice is sent 14 days in advance of the maturity date.

Query: FD maturity period mudiya muthal withdrawal panna mudiyuma?
Expected Answer: No notice of withdrawal is necessary. However In a case of a withdrawal through a branch it is advisable to give one days notice as the payments are processed at a central location.
Actual Answer: No notice of withdrawal is necessary. However In a case of a withdrawal through a branch it is advisable to give one days notice as the payments are processed at a central location.

Query: Senior citizens account yarellam open pannalam?
Expected Answer: Customers who are 60 years of age or above are eligible to obtain a HNB FINANCE Senior Citizens account
Actual Answer: Customers who are 60 years of age or above are eligible to obtain a HNB FINANCE Senior Citizens account

Query: Senior citizens account la oru person antha age layum mata person atha vida kuranja age layum irukra maathiri account open panna mudiyuma?
Expected Answer: No At the time of opening the account all joint holders must complete the age of 60 Years.
Actual Answer: Customers who are 60 years of age or above are eligible to obtain a HNB FINANCE Senior Citizens account

Query: Cheques use panni engada account ku deposit panna mudiyuma?
Expected Answer: Cheques favoring a third party (not the depositor) are not accepted. However uncrossed cheques drawn in favor of the depositor could be accepted. All deposits made by cheques are subject to realization of the proceeds.
Actual Answer: Please visit www.abc.lk or call 0771234567 for more details

Query: Enda combank digital account block aakitu eppidi unlock pannurathu?

You can either visit the www.combankdigital.com web site or open your Mobile App and click Having trouble logging in? If you are using a Mobile app and you have logged onto the app previously first click Login with another user.
Actual Answer: Please visit www.abc.lk or call 0771234567 for more details

Query: Can I withdraw my Fixed Deposit before maturity?
Expected Answer: Yes. You could at any given time. However you could obtain a FD agents Loan without withdrawing your deposit.
Actual Answer: Yes. You could at any given time. However you could obtain a FD agents Loan without withdrawing your deposit.

Query: என்ன வகையான உபகரணங்கள் நிதியளிக்கப்படுகின்றன?
Expected Answer: Motor vehicles three wheelers motor cycles tractors construction equipment plant and machinery computers etc.
Actual Answer: Motor vehicles three wheelers motor cycles tractors construction equipment plant and machinery computers etc.

Query: குத்தகை மூலம் நிதியளிப்பதன் நன்மைகள் என்ன?
Expected Answer: 1. Facilities can be obtained much faster than traditional forms of financing 2. Requires less documents 3. Known monthly commitment 4. Frees up bank lines 5. Repayment plans according to your requirement (Structured and Residual Lease Facilities)
Actual Answer: 1. Facilities can be obtained much faster than traditional forms of financing 2. Requires less documents 3. Known monthly commitment 4. Frees up bank lines 5. Repayment plans according to your requirement (Structured and Residual Lease Facilities)

Query: கடனை தவணை முறையில் திருப்பி செலுத்த முடியுமா?
Expected Answer: Yes. Until the Maturity of the Deposit takes place the loan can be repaid. Thereafter if you wish the loan balance could be carried forward subject to renewal of the deposit.
Actual Answer: Yes. Until the Maturity of the Deposit takes place the loan can be repaid. Thereafter if you wish the loan balance could be carried forward subject to renewal of the deposit.

Query: கடன் பெற என்னென்ன ஆவணங்கள் தேவை?
Expected Answer: 1. Original Fixed deposit certificate 2. Loan application form signed by the depositor s as per the operating instruction given in the deposit application
Actual Answer: 1. Original Fixed deposit certificate 2. Loan application form signed by the depositor s as per the operating instruction given in the deposit application

Query: தற்காலிக கடன் பெற என்ன அறிவிப்பு அவசியம்?
Expected Answer: No notice is necessary.
Actual Answer: No notice is necessary.

Query: வைப்புத்தொகையில் கடனை அனுமதிப்பீர்களா?
Expected Answer: Yes  you are eligible to apply for a loan against your deposit ranging from 70% to 90% of the capital value according to the category of the depositYes  you are eligible to apply for a loan against your deposit ranging from 70% to 90% of the capital value according to the category of the deposit
Actual Answer: Yes  you are eligible to apply for a loan against your deposit ranging from 70% to 90% of the capital value according to the category of the deposit

Query: டெபாசிட் செய்பவர்களில் ஒருவரின் கையொப்பம் முதிர்வு அல்லது முன்கூட்டியே பணம் செலுத்த போதுமானதா?"
Expected Answer: This depends on the operating instructions given at the time of opening of the account as in some cases it could be both all or either party.
Actual Answer: This depends on the operating instructions given at the time of opening of the account as in some cases it could be both all or either party.

Query: நான் முன்கூட்டியே பணம் பெற முடியுமா?
Expected Answer: This would depend on the age of the asset marketability of the asset credit worthiness of the applicant etc.
Actual Answer: This would depend on the age of the asset marketability of the asset credit worthiness of the applicant etc.

Query: எனக்கு அவசரமாக பணம் தேவைப்பட்டால் நான் டெபாசிட்டை திரும்பப் பெறலாமா?
Expected Answer: Yes you can. The Deposit could be withdrawn on request of the depositor and at the discretion of the company subject to a discounted interest rate. In a case of a joint account withdrawal will be allowed as per the operating instructions given by the joint holders.
Actual Answer: Yes you can. The Deposit could be withdrawn on request of the depositor and at the discretion of the company subject to a discounted interest rate. In a case of a joint account withdrawal will be allowed as per the operating instructions given by the joint holders.

Query: திரும்பப் பெறுவதற்கான அறிவிப்பை நான் வழங்க வேண்டுமா?
Expected Answer: No notice of withdrawal is necessary. However In a case of a withdrawal through a branch it is advisable to give one days notice as the payments are processed at a central location.
Actual Answer: No notice of withdrawal is necessary. However In a case of a withdrawal through a branch it is advisable to give one days notice as the payments are processed at a central location.

Query: என்ன நடக்கும் to my account when I reach the age of a 60 years?
Expected Answer: Talk to your customer care officer and you could make necessary changes when renewing   opening a new deposit or savings account.
Actual Answer: Talk to your customer care officer and you could make necessary changes when renewing   opening a new deposit or savings account.

Query: What other benefits are available for HNB FINANCE வைப்பாளர்களுக்கு?
Expected Answer: 1. Loan facilities against the deposit. 2. Letters of guarantee (Bank Guarantees) 3. TR facilities through ATMs .
Actual Answer: 1. Loan facilities against the deposit. 2. Letters of guarantee (Bank Guarantees) 3. TR facilities through ATMs .

Query: Do you pay மாதாந்திர வட்டி on deposits?
Expected Answer: Yes interest can be paid monthly or at maturity
Actual Answer: Yes interest can be paid monthly or at maturity

Query: What are the modes by which வட்டி is paid?
Expected Answer: As per the instruction given by the depositor the interest payment can be arranged as follows; Payment to the account designated by the customer (E.g. HNB FINANCE Savings account or other bank accounts)
Actual Answer: As per the instruction given by the depositor the interest payment can be arranged as follows; Payment to the account designated by the customer (E.g. HNB FINANCE Savings account or other bank accounts)

Query: Can you pay வட்டி to the இரண்டாவது வைப்பாளர் or a designated person?
Expected Answer: Yes. with the instructions of deposit holder s the interest can be paid either to one of the joint holders or to a third party with a written consent of the deposit account holders.
Actual Answer: Yes. with the instructions of deposit holder s the interest can be paid either to one of the joint holders or to a third party with a written consent of the deposit account holders.

Query: When do you intimate the maturity of the வைப்புத்தொகை?
Expected Answer: A computer generated renewal notice is sent 14 days in advance of the maturity date.
Actual Answer: A computer generated renewal notice is sent 14 days in advance of the maturity date.

Query: What I should do to get my வைப்புத்தொகை renewed?
Expected Answer: The completed renewal notice and the matured term deposit certificate should be sent to us or you may hand over these documents to any of our Branches to issue a new certificate on renewal.
Actual Answer: The completed renewal notice and the matured term deposit certificate should be sent to us or you may hand over these documents to any of our Branches to issue a new certificate on renewal.

Query: Are the signatures of all the  கூட்டு வைப்பாளர் required on the renewal form?
Expected Answer: This is subject to the operating instructions given at the time of opening the account.
Actual Answer: This is subject to the operating instructions given at the time of opening the account.

Query: If I do not respond to the renewal notice what will happen to my வைப்புத்தொகை?
Expected Answer: On a Monthly Interest payment fixed Deposit the capital will be renewed automatically with the prevailing interest rate for the same period. And if it is a maturity deposit the capital will be renewed with the accrued interest and will be renewed for the equal period at the prevailing rate.
Actual Answer: On a Monthly Interest payment fixed Deposit the capital will be renewed automatically with the prevailing interest rate for the same period. And if it is a maturity deposit the capital will be renewed with the accrued interest and will be renewed for the equal period at the prevailing rate.

Query: At maturity how can I withdraw my வைப்புத்தொகை?
Expected Answer: You have to surrender the original deposit certificate duly discharged with the payment instruction.
Actual Answer: You have to surrender the original deposit certificate duly discharged with the payment instructions.
